settings.hero_subtitle: Discover the full power of Market Sniper Bot Suite with automated trading, professional indicators, and expert support

settings.title: 100% Automated Trading
settings.description: Execute long and short positions automatically with intelligent take-profit and stop-loss management. Trade 24/7 without being glued to your screen.

settings.title: Proven Strategies Included
settings.description: Access battle-tested trading strategies that are automatically synced to your TradingView account. No configuration needed.

settings.title: Risk Management Built-In
settings.description: Smart position sizing, automatic stop losses, and take profit levels protect your capital while maximizing returns.

settings.title: Real-Time Discord Alerts
settings.description: Get instant notifications for every trade execution, entry, exit, and important market signals directly in Discord.

settings.title: Continuous Optimization
settings.description: Our team constantly refines and improves bot strategies based on market conditions and performance data.

settings.title: Priority Support
settings.description: Get dedicated assistance with bot configuration, strategy questions, and optimization from our expert team.

settings.title: Set It and Forget It Trading
settings.subtitle: Let the bot handle the heavy lifting while you focus on strategy

settings.title: Sharp Shooter Candles
settings.description: Revolutionary candlestick indicator that identifies high-probability trading setups with precise entry and exit points. Fully customizable with intuitive color-coding for instant market analysis.
settings.features:
✓ Buy/Sell Signal Detection
✓ Reversal Candle Identification
✓ MACD Bearish/Bullish Crossover
✓ MACD Above/Below Zero Line
✓ Trending Dots for Direction
✓ Multiple Customization Options
✓ Real-time TradingView Integration

settings.title: Sharp Shooter RSI
settings.description: Advanced RSI divergence detection tool that helps you identify trend changes before price action confirms them. Gain a competitive edge with early buy and sell signals.
settings.features:
✓ RSI Divergence Detection
✓ Early Buy/Sell Signal Alerts
